\begin{tikzpicture}[thick,scale=1, every node/.style={scale=1.3}]
  \begin{groupplot}[
      group style = {
        group size = 3 by 1,
        %horizontal sep = 4cm,
      },
      view = {0}{90},
      % just for example (faster compile times ...)
      samples=10
    ]
      \nextgroupplot[
       y filter/.expression={y==0 ? nan : y},
      xlabel=Beam search,
            ylabel=Caption,
             title=  ResNet LM initialization, 
          % want tick labels on the left side
         %colorbar right,
          colormap={mycolormap}{
        %color(0)=(white) color(35)=(babyblue!40) color(80)=(darksalmon)},
        color(0)=(white) color(35)=(babyblue) color(80)=(darksalmon)},
        %color(0)=(white) color(35)=(pistachio!40) color(80)=(darksalmon)},
          colorbar style = {
            ylabel = A,
            % position it to the right of the axis
            at={(rel axis cs: 1.3,0)},
            anchor=south,
            % use this name to position second colorbar
            name=cb1,
            point meta max=1,
            % reduce width
            width=2mm,
            % remove frame around colorbar
            axis line style={draw=none}
          }]
     % \addplot3[surf] {x^2 * y^2};
      %\addplot3[surf] {x^2 * y^2};
      \addplot3 [surf] file  {temp.dat};
      
      \nextgroupplot[
       y filter/.expression={y==0 ? nan : y},
           % want tick labels on right side of colorbar
           colorbar right,
            colormap={mycolormap}{
       % color(0)=(white) color(35)=(babyblue!40) color(80)=(darksalmon)},
        color(0)=(white) color(35)=(babyblue) color(80)=(darksalmon)},
        %color(0)=(white) color(35)=(pistachio!40) color(80)=(darksalmon)},
            title= ResNet Classifier confident,
            xlabel=Beam search,
            ylabel= ,
         colorbar style = {
            ylabel = ,
            % position it to the right of the axis
            at={(rel axis cs: 2.17,0)},
            anchor=south,
            point meta max=1,
            % use this name to position second colorbar
            %name=cb1,
            % reduce width
            width=2mm,
            % remove frame around colorbar
            axis line style={draw=none}
          }]
      \addplot3 [surf] file {temp_1.dat};

  \end{groupplot}

% draw frame around both bars
\draw (cb1.south west) rectangle (cb2.north east);
\end{tikzpicture}
